properties.headline: Snow Squall Warning issued January 8 at 8:14AM EST until January 8 at 9:00AM EST by NWS State College PA
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in State College PA has issued a

* Snow Squall Warning for...
Southern Adams County in south central Pennsylvania...
Southern York County in south central Pennsylvania...

* Until 900 AM EST.

* At 814 AM EST, a dangerous snow squall was located over Gettysburg,
moving east at 35 mph.

HAZARD...Extremely poor visibility in snow and blowing snow. Wind
gusts greater than 30 mph.

SOURCE...Radar indicated.

IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel.

* This includes Interstate 83 from mile markers 0 to 9.

This includes the following highways...
Route 15 from south of Gettysburg to north of Gettysburg.
Route 30 from Cashtown to Abbottstown.
State Road 97 from Gettysburg to the Maryland border.

Locations impacted include...
Hanover, Gettysburg, Parkville, Littlestown, Shrewsbury, Codorus,
McSherrystown, Spring Grove, Stewartstown, Glen Rock, Pennville,
Bonneauville, New Oxford, Lake Heritage, Cross Roads, Cashtown,
Railroad, Orrtanna, Loganville and Biglerville.
properties.instruction:
Reduce your speed and turn on headlights! During snow squalls, the
visibility may suddenly drop to near zero in whiteout conditions.

CMAMtext: Snow Squall Warning til 9:00 AM EST. Sudden whiteouts. Icy roads. Slow down! -NWS
